english.segment1: I will sing of my Redeemer. And His wondrous love for me. On the cruel cross He suffered. From the curse to set me free
english.segment2: I will tell the wondrous story. How my lost estate He saved. In His boundless love and mercy. He the ransom freely gave
english.segment3: I will sing. Sing of my Redeemer. With His blood. He has purchased me. On the Cross. Jesus sealed my pardon. He paid the debt and set me free
english.segment4: I will praise my dear Redeemer. His triumphant power I'll tell. Of the victory He gives us. Over sin and death and hell
english.segment5: I will sing of my Redeemer. His Relentless love for me. He from death to life has brought us. Son of God with Him to be
english.segment6: We will praise the Lamb for sinners slain. For His blood can wash away our stain. Singing glory, glory to His name. For His blood can wash awayÂ…
